ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: HH has named orcs for sure.  I ve been fighting them for the last couple weeks also.  Sharlok is the one I ve been chasing..   =)  he has my 150 plat...  he s
ygData.messageBody:
HH has named orcs for sure. I've been fighting them for the last couple weeks also. Sharlok is the one I've been chasing.. =) he has my 150 plat... he's holding it for me until I can meet up with him =)

Where the heck are named Orcs in Kithicor? Sharlok is right near the entrance to HH from Kithicor.. maybe 10 second walk into the zone...

Also.. what do the named orcs in Kithicor carry? Anything worth it?

Thanks

Drev

> ----------
> From: Chris Trubiani[SMTP:u1607755@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 12:19 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components
>
> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>
> Ok, it's very possible that HH has named orcs, I've just never seen one.
> Though I'm still pretty sure the named orcs in HH aren't lvl 15, are they?
>
> Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Valacian <abryson@...>
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 3:05 PM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components
>
>
> >Highhold definitely has named orcs. They give shiny brass halberds and
> shiny brass idols. I know, I've been there for about two weeks!
> >
> >Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

> >
> >Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
